title: Full Stack Serverless with Prisma & Next.js

title: Securing React Apps Using Auth0

title: Beginner Pitfalls: My Personal Journey
description: A talk on the mistakes I made when learning how to code

description: A talk on what is Gatsby and how it creates incredibly fast websites

title: Hooked: How To Build Habit Forming Products
description: A lightning-talk about patterns used by apps that hook and engage us
